title: Mules and Men -  "soul lives by" intended

content.question: In context, the phrase "that which the soul lives by" (end of paragraph 7) is probably intended to

choices.label: suggest that the most powerful folktales are never revealed
give value to the folklore tradition
arouse skepticism about the speaker's objectivity

content.answer: give value to the folklore tradition

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
